mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, aa.* from (select * from BOARD order by POST_IDX desc) aa) where rnum>#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
SELECT ROUND((#{post_date}-sysdate)*24*60) FROM board where post_idx=#{post_idx}
select * from board_cmt where post_idx=#{post_idx} order by cmt_date desc
select count(POST_IDX) from BOARD where ${catgo} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD(post_idx, board_idx, post_writer, post_subject, content, post_date) values(board_seq.nextval, #{board_idx}, #{post_writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post_subject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set post_subject=#{post_subject}, content=#{content} where post_idx=#{post_idx}
UPDATE BOARD SET post_count=post_count+1 WHERE post_idx=#{post_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cmt(comment_idx, cmt_writer, post_idx, board_idx, cmt_content, cmt_date) VALUES(BOARD_CMT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cmt_writer}, #{post_idx, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{board_idx}, #{cmt_content}, sysdate)
